long_description: The Chuckit! Amphibious Bumper dog toy is ideal for a quick game of tug-o-war, or fling it far afield for an energy-burning game of fetch. Nylon, rubber and memory foam construction floats, endures abrasion and goes easy on your dog's mouth. Knotted rope handle provides a non-slip hold, giving you the advantage. Not intended as a chew toy.
short_description: The Chuckit! Amphibious Bumper dog toy is ideal for a quick game of tug-o-war, or fling it far afield for an energy-burning game of fetch.
